name: Nicole Deskin
coverLetter:
Hello, my name is Nicole and I am looking for full time trimmer work beginning of November. I'll be moving out there soon and I am looking to gain more experience in the mmj industry. My current experience includes grow house over sight and budtender/delivery driver for a mmj delivery company in orange county called Pharmsquad. Please feel free to contact me via cell phone or email anytime you would like, and I appreciate the opportunity. Thanks! 

Nicole
